backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user streaks with access control, providing query and update methods to read and record daily completions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing feature IDs, involved files, components, and test references for CEFR and language‑related updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint containing the root div and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component controlling navigation between home and learning views with theming support.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing navigation controls, branding, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper adding textured background and centered content container.
frontend/src/components/CompleteSectionB: Button that triggers section completion recording using authentication and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown for selecting a language with flag icons and metadata from the centralized language list.
frontend/src/components/LessonSectionNav: Tabs-based navigation component for switching between lesson sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login, logout, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/PronunciationCon: Audio pronunciation control using speech synthesis with play/stop behavior and error display.
frontend/src/components/StreakPanel.tsx: React component displaying streak data with loading and unauthenticated states, pulling data via hooks and formatting stats in a card layout.
frontend/src/data/lessonsSeed.ts: Defines lesson data structures and provides seeded A1 English lesson content with placeholders for other levels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching streak data and recording daily completions, updating cache and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook for browser speech synthesis, supporting language-specific voices and tracking speaking state and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for themes and global layout settings.
frontend/src/lib/cefrLevels.ts: Defines CEFR level types, metadata, and the default level used across the app.
frontend/src/lib/languages.ts: Defines a Language interface and a list of 20 European languages with codes, names, native names, and flag image paths.
frontend/src/lib/lessonContent.ts: Fetches lesson content by language, section, and CEFR level, returning placeholders when data is missing.
frontend/src/lib/lessonStructure.ts: Defines lesson sections and their labels and descriptions for structuring course content.
frontend/src/lib/localDate.ts: Provides utilities for generating a YYYYMMDD date number and formatting streak dates into readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/speechSynthesisLanguage: Maps internal language codes to corresponding BCP-47 tags for the Web Speech API.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with language selection cards allowing users to pick a language to study.
Displays the main learning interface with level selection, section navigation, lesson content, and language switching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, plugins, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s state, supported languages, CEFR-level plans, UI asset requirements, and existing implemented features for the Euro 20 language-learning app. Includes metadata, architectural notes, and required flag images.
